homepage_description-text: I am Andrea, I was born in Borgosesia (VC) and I have always lived in Varallo (VC). I fell in love with IT when I was eleven years old. I started to learn coding basics and programming fundamentals. Now I'm studyng IT in Novara and I'm in the third year. After graduate, I want to enroll in the Computer Engineering class at the university. Currently, I develop website as a freelancer. I love working in team and get involved in new projects. I'm a creative thinker, problem solver and design lover.
